newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: Tullow Oil says to start testing in Pakistan.
newsitem.headline: Tullow Oil says to start testing in Pakistan.

text.p: Irish exploration group Tullow Oil Plc said on Friday that it was about to commence a testing programme in Pakistan following the detection of gas shows during drilling.
Tullow said that the result of the drilling should be known within the next two weeks.
"If the results are material a further announcement will be made," Tullow said in a statement prompted by recent stock market activity in its shares and a jump in its share price.
Tullow shares were at 105.5 Irish pence in Dublin by 1328 GMT, up 11 pence on the day.
